basics.label: Administrative Assistant Director, Human Resources Manager, Production Manager, Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Dedicated and focused Administrative Assistant who excels at prioritizing, completing multiple tasks simultaneously, and following through to achieve project goals.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Administrative Assistant Director, Human Resources Manager, Production Manager, Engineering Manager, Technical Services Manager, and Information Technology Manager
work.summary: Provided administrative support to production departments, IT, and Human Resources. Established and maintained complete files and records. Composed and typed reports and correspondence. Responded to inquiries from employees.
highlights: Created purchase requisitions, work orders, and goods receipts using proprietary software interfaced with SAP.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: SAP Site Security Administrator/SAP Training Records Coordinator
work.summary: Supported all Human Resources functions. Generated reports from PeopleSoft and from site's Access personnel database.
highlights: Compiled statistics for site Safety Report
Planned and managed Excellence Recognition Awards program and GSK Service Awards Program

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided instruction on use of Microsoft Word and Excel software packages.
highlights: Taught course entitled 'Introduction to Computers via Microsoft Windows.'
